trends: There has been one other sighting in Fort Mohave
There were no other sightings in Fort Mohave on or around January 30th 2003
Summary: Saw a disc shaped craft with 6 lights steady faste
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside looking at the dog crap i needed to pick up and i saw my dogsbarking at the sky, So i looked up and saw what i first thaught was a low aircraft. But this thing went from a dead stop to what i think must have been 1 or2 hundred mph, I stood there and watched it for 1 to 2 minuets going north eastthan it stoped and went south west STOPED ON A DIME And went the otherdirection. FASTEST F--KING THING I HAVE EVER SEENiT WAS 35 TO 40 FEET ROUNDMAYBE BIGGERIT HAD A COLOR OF BLUE GREY-ISH. i WAS WATCHING IT AS IT WENT SOUTHWEST THAN IT JUST DISSAPIERED damnest thing i have EVER SEEN WHAT A EXPIERIANCE,NEVER SEEN A THING LIKE THAT BEFOR
